Tip of the Day
The base chance to find most Chests is 1/250, which you can increase with better gear and tools.

Gold bar

Gold bar
Type: Material
Value: 10
Fine Value: 51
Keyword: Bar
Properties:
Bankable:     Droppable:
Sellable:     Tradable:

Whether you used nuggets or ore, the gold bar reaches the 333 fineness margin dictated by the Trinketry Factory.

The Gold bar item is a material.

Uses

Recipe Ingredient

Gold bar is an ingredient in the following recipes:

Item Name Service
Requirement 		Skills Materials
Used 		Recipe
Outputs

Job Boards

Gold bar can be requested from the following job:

Job Board Name Location Quantity Item Type Reward
Everhaven combined job board Everhaven 1 +1  Erdwise Faction Reputation

Chest Name Quantity Chance

(Per Chest) 		Odds

Note: Chests roll for loot multiple times.
